CustomField.formula: CASE(Subject, "Bem-vindo/a a Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Obrigado pelo seu pedido de adesão - os seus dados estão agora a ser verificados", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Registou-se com sucesso na Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Bem-vindo à Trusted Shops!", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "O seu contacto pessoal na Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),5,0), 0)
CustomField.label: Application Subject PT
